channel.title: [PI] Stringing ItemIds
channel.description:
Anyone know how to string a item id??
I tried this for 1 hour, failed. BAdly.
Example:
client.getDialoguesSM("You use the "+ Spinner[j][0] +" on the spinner and create a " + Spinner[j][3] + ".");
When that happens it shows as:
You use the 1779 on the spinner and create a 1777.
how can I make it like this:
you use the flax on the spinner and create a bow string.
??

item.title: [PI] Stringing ItemIds
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

[quote=“Driman Rune, post:1, topic:525178”]Anyone know how to string a item id??

I tried this for 1 hour, failed. BAdly.

Example:

client.getDialoguesSM("You use the “+ Spinner[j][0] +” on the spinner and create a " + Spinner[j][3] + “.”);

When that happens it shows as:

You use the 1779 on the spinner and create a 1777.

how can I make it like this:

you use the flax on the spinner and create a bow string.

??[/quote]

getNameForID(Spinner[j][0])

Something similar to that? Obviously the method name will be different but I’m sure there is something close to that in near enough every base now

Read full topic
